title: Really glad that AP Kai'sa can 1v5 right now.
body:
1100 magic damage passive, a shield that literally over shields her entire health bar as well as a 700 damage long ranged Ashe e, with a dash that's 3000 units wide and has perma invis. They even had a Veigar on their team and her passive was out damaging Veigar's ult, when Veigar has 1300 AP. A whopping 63k damage the entire game, where Veigar did 38k. 

Stop jerking your dicks on your round tables and fix the game please. There's way too much damage.
